thread.title: Ralph Potter Honored That McCallie is Naming Football Field For His Father Pete
thread.title_full: Ralph Potter Honored That McCallie is Naming Football Field For His Father Pete

title: Ralph Potter Honored That McCallie is Naming Football Field For His Father Pete
text: Share Updated: 10/09 6:34 pm Chattanooga-(WDEF) Before McCallie's game tonight against Ensworth, the school will name their football field in honor of a former coach, the late Pete Potter, who is the Blue Tornado's all-time winningest coach. Pete is also the father of current McCallie Coach, Ralph Potter.Said Ralph,"Well, I'm just glad they are going to do it. It's well-deserved. I'm glad my mom is going to be able to see it. I think it's really going to be great for our family. It means a lot for our family. It means a lot to guys who played for him. Guys that are around my age. I think for us, it's something that really puts a stamp on this was a special man and a special time."
